com.bigdata.cache

Interface HardReferenceQueueEvictionListener<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IEvictionListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultEvictionListener, DefaultEvictionListener, MyEvictionListener, NoEvictionListener, NOPEvictionListener

    public interface HardReferenceQueueEvictionListener<T>
    Interface for reporting cache evictions.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void evicted(IHardReferenceQueue<T> cache, T ref)
      Notice that a reference is being evicted from the cache.

    • Method Detail

      • evicted

        void evicted(IHardReferenceQueue<T> cache,
           T ref)
        Notice that a reference is being evicted from the cache. This notice does NOT imply that the cache no longer holds a reference to this object, neither does it imply that the object is dirty.
        Parameters:
        cache - The cache on which the listener is registered.
        ref - The reference that is being evicted from the cache.
